sen.e: Kihiro SANJO (1577 - November 25, 1626) was Kugyo (court noble) from Azuchi-Momoyama period to the early Edo period.

sen.e: He mostly served the Imperial Court for two generations, Emperor Goyozei (107th) and Emperor Gomizunoo (108th), however, even though he was the head of the Sanjo family of the Seiga family (the second highest family status for court nobles), he couldn't become a minister, and after his death, he was sorely missed and conferred Naidaijin (minister of the center) posthumously.
